text: Henry Chaddesden was a 14th-century English priest:University of Leicester he was Archdeacon of Leicester from 1347 until his death in 1354.During this period there was a counter-claimant, Arnald de Gavarreto == Notes == ==Also see== * Diocese of Lincoln * Diocese of Peterborough * Diocese of Leicester * Archdeacon of Leicester Category:Archdeacons of Leicester Category:14th- century English people Category:People from Derbyshire Category:1354 deaths
title: Henry Chaddesden
